alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 5:58PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN BALDWIN COUNTY THROUGH 645 PM CDT... At 558 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles east of Point Clear, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gulf Shores, Foley, Orange Beach, Point Clear, Lillian, Magnolia Springs, Bon Secour, Summerdale, Perdido Beach, and Elberta. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
